name: Darak Lyll
content: Darak Lyll was a tall, long-haired and bearded Human criminal who lived on Alderaan. To earn money, Han Solo, on his visit to Alderaan in the year 10 BBY, tried to sell Darak Lyll the glitterstorm charge of the Ylesian Dream. Lyll declined this, however, because it was reportedly on Alderaan no market for glittering.
